title: Course Schedule
text:
Important Dates

Spring Break: March 21-29, 2026 (No classes)
Last Day of Classes: May 6, 2026
Reading Period: May 7-10, 2026
Final Exams: May 11-19, 2026

title: ECON1550 International Finance
text:
Canvas is the official home for this course. Everything you need—announcements, assignments, grades, policies, and course materials—is available there.
This website and the GitHub repository mirror the course materials and offer a few extras:

LaTeX source files — edit or build upon the original source code for problem sets and notes
Modification dates — see exactly when each file was last updated
Version history — browse the commit history to see all changes over time, or compare any two versions
Programmatic access — clone the repo or use the GitHub API to automate your workflow

If you just want to download PDFs, Canvas is simpler. This site is here for those who want more.
